description: The Samurai Sword Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Samarzam') is an amazing plant species. It is a small, deciduous tree with bright green foliage that turns to a dazzling reddish-purple in the summer and a vibrant red in the fall. It has remarkable, upright, fan-like, lobed leaves and is widely admired for its beauty, uniqueness and striking texture. Known for its resistance to disease and strong stem, the Samurai Sword Japanese Maple is perfect for any landscape. Its amazing texture and color make it an ideal specimen or accent tree for a garden.
